Uses of Class
game.Coordinate

Packages that use Coordinate
Package
Description
game
 
pieces
This package holds all the different types of pieces that are used in a game of chess, specifically: King, Queen, Bishop, Knight, Pawn, and Rook.

  • Uses of Coordinate in game

    Fields in game with type parameters of type Coordinate
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private List<Coordinate>
    Chessboard.selectedCoordinates
    A List of Coordinate objects which represent the tiles the selected piece can move to.
    Method parameters in game with type arguments of type Coordinate
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    Chessboard.filterCheckMoves(Piece piece, List<Coordinate> coordinates)
    This method filters non-valid check related moves from a list of coordinates that a piece could potentially move to.

    This helper method is used in the generateMoves() method.
    private boolean
    King.underAttack(List<Coordinate> positions, Tile[][] tiles)
    This helper method is used within the castling helper methods to determine if any of the pieces between the Rook or King may be be attacked.
